amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for National Forest System vegetation and watershed by $2 million and increases funding for Capital Improvement and Maintenance by a similar amount in order to allow the Forest Service to keep more forest roads open.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the National Forest System by 2 million and increase the Capital Improvement and Maintenance by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Benishek.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
